about_the_game:
Sempra Infernalis is a good ol'fashioned rogue inspired demon slayer. You will not survive! At least not on your first try...

SINGLE PLAYER DEMON SLAYING

Your stuck in the infernal realm. Slaughter your way through the truly endless hordes of demons, your goal: reach the inter-dimensional portal that will return you safely to the mortal realm. The problem is the portal's not working! Explore an expansive hellish landscape to find infernal artefacts, drain their power and get that portal working! If you survive long enough to reach the portal, one of the arch demons most faithful may take it upon themselves to do everything in their considerable power to prevent your escape.

YOU ARE ALONE, BUT NOT OUTGUNNED

Utilise a wide array of weapons, abilities and unique gear items to ensure you are at the cutting edge of devilkin destruction. From dependable hot lead, to mines, to escort drones and even arcane magical runes that turn the evil magic of hell back on those that dwell there, the tools for demon annihilation are fully at your disposal.

UPGRADE OR DIE TRYING

Harvest the essence of the slayed hell spawn at your feet and spend it on upgrades to increase your survivability. Unlock new more powerful weapons or upgrade existing ones, purchase special gear items and buy powerful new suit enhancements. If you wish, go a step further and unlock secret legendary items and abilities by progressing special achievements and objectives. Before long the demons of hell will cower in front your your righteous wrath! With each playthrough you get stronger and before long, you will not fear the demon horde, they will fear you...

INCREASINGLY DANGEROUS FOES

The longer you spend in hell, the more demons become aware of your mortal presence and in turn, dispatch more dangerous enemies to deal with you. New and unique enemies will spawn dynamically to intercept you so be sure to keep moving and watch your back.

THE FINAL SHOWDOWN

Your route out of hell is blocked by many obstacles. Dangerous obstacles, obstacles that usually have big claws and a thirst for mortal flesh... No such obstacles however are more deadly than the powerful Arch-Demons that monitor the only way out. Do battle with the strongest hell has to offer. Best them, and surely then you will have earned your freedom.

HELL IS ADDICTIVE

Most don't escape hell. But those that do often develop a yearning for demon slaughter. Go back into hell, perfect your art and achieve the mightiest of crowns, The No Damage Run. Return again and again and drop demons again and again with near infinite replay-ability. The realm of hell does indeed have many secrets just waiting to be discovered.

content_descriptors.notes: There are no sexual themes within this game. However violence is prevalent throughout. The violence in this game is intended to be deliberately over the top and amusing rather than a simulation or depiction of real world violence against animals or human beings.

name: Sempra Infernalis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5th Gen (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/a
  • VR Support: VR Not Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 8th Gen (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Super (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/a
  • VR Support: VR Not Supported

short_description: Fight your way out of hell against the increasingly dangerous hell spawn devoted to making YOU, the latest addition to the unhappy infernal family. Upgrade your character to improve your chances of escape and seek out and unlock legendary weapons and abilities in this epically fun demon slayer.
